arts.ttl: Scotland vs Greece – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Scotland hosts Greece at Hampden Park on Thursday in a crucial FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifier that could significantly shape both nations’ qualification hopes. Both teams are locked in a tight battle for supremacy in Group C, with Scotland currently sitting second on four points, just ahead of Greece on three points.
